amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate $900 million provided for the importation of petroleum products to Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the funds in the bill providing petroleum products for Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 256 (Roll no. 551).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Holt.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
